content: this adorable squishy bunny is a sweet crochet pattern perfect for easter or spring it works up quickly with super bulky weight yarn and is so fun to crochet tuck this cute bunny into your holiday decor or give as a gift for old or young alike this bunny amigurumi is as enjoyable to make as it is to give note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own bunny skill level intermediate pattern is written in english using standard american terms > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern size bunny is 4 5 tall minus ears x 4 wide materials needed - super bulky weight #6 yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook sizes h/8 5 00 mm - 12 mm safety eyes - fiberfill - stitch marker - tapestry needle and scissors pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-amigurumi-bunny/
